locationInfo.description:
The bicycle service located at 54 Druid St is the perfect destination if you seek professionalism and expertise in bike repairs. Our team of specialists has a long-standing track record of effectively maintaining and customizing bikes of all kinds.

Whether it's a classic city bike, a rugged mountain bike, or a cutting-edge electric bike, we are fully equipped to tackle any challenge.

Situated in London St Saviours estate district, our location offers convenient access for all repair needs. We value transparency at our bicycle service, ensuring you are informed about the anticipated costs of any planned repairs before they are undertaken.

serviceCards.title: Bicycle MOT
serviceCards.description: Full safety check plus tweaks and adjustments. Keeps you riding, with complete peace of mind.
package_list: Inspection & adjustment of brakes, gears, frame, forks, handlebars & headset.
Tyres check for damage and inflated to the correct pressure.
Does not include the cost of replacing parts.

serviceCards.title: Solid Fettle
serviceCards.description: Full safety check plus tweaks and adjustments. Keeps you riding, with complete peace of mind.
package_list: EVERYTHING IN THE BICYCLE MOT PACKAGE
Bottom bracket checked for wear, adjusted if necessary.
Brake calipers removed, cleaned and re-greased.
Wheels checked over, spokes checked for damage and tension.
Includes fitting any replacement parts approved by you. Parts not included.

serviceCards.title: Full Fettle
serviceCards.description: Full safety check plus tweaks and adjustments. Keeps you riding, with complete peace of mind.
package_list: EVERYTHING IN THE SOLID FETTLE PACKAGE
Both hubs are taken apart and bearings inspected for wear, replacements installed if necessary.
Headset is taken apart and inspected for wear, replacement quoted if necessary.
The bike is stripped and cleaned thoroughly.
During the rebuild, we make sure to use the correct paste compounds and lubricants, re-torquing components to the manufacturer specific requirements to get those marginal gains.

AboutPage.title: We are Fettle. We're here to reinvent repair.
AboutPage.subTitle: fettle is the UK's most progressive and fastest growing bike repair network, offering hassle free servicing and complete peace of mind for riders of all types.
text: An escape. A pass. A challenge. A rush.
No matter the query, cycling often holds the answer.
Autonomy. Unfettered journeys. Invigorating air. Swift stretches.
Diverse motivations lead us to mount the saddle. Yet, a shared emotion unites us upon dismounting – renewed, healthy, optimistic, and proud.

Certainly, some grumble about congested lanes, harsh weather, aching derrières, but these gripes soon fade.
The genuine distress surfaces when you're barred from the pedals. When injuries intervene. When life's demands detain you.
A bicycle that's out of order? One that doesn't perform as intended? This breeds a distinct frustration. A vexation that frequently worsens before it betters.
This predicament arises because resurrecting your bike comes with challenges akin to the size of London's potholes.
E-commerce stands as the greatest technological revolution since the wheel's inception. Still, the bicycle service sector clings to antiquated methods.
Our purpose is to rectify this imbalance. Our resolve is steadfast.

We intend to meld traditional expertise with contemporary service standards. Greased rags with tech-driven ingenuity.
Physical locations with instantaneous notifications.
Mediocrity seldom sparks acclaim. Hence, we've established a venture entirely centered on you.
To ensure London's riders continue their journey.
